content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'STUDY':
content.explanation: Aquí debes empezar la oración con la cláusula del pasado, manteniendo la idea original de la condición y el resultado.
content.stimulus_en:
If I had studied harder, I would be a doctor now.

Had I studied... ...
content.correct_answer: harder, I would be a doctor now.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'KNOW':
content.explanation: La transformación requiere el uso del pasado en la cláusula condicional, para reflejar el significado original.
content.stimulus_en:
If she had known the truth, she would act differently.

Had she known... ...
content.correct_answer: the truth, she would act differently.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'ARRIVE':
content.explanation: Debes iniciar la oración con la hipótesis del pasado y conectar adecuadamente con el resultado que se menciona.
content.stimulus_en:
If we had arrived earlier, we would see the start of the show.

Had we arrived... ...
content.correct_answer: earlier, we would see the start of the show.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'TAKE':
content.explanation: Necesitas transformar la cláusula condicional manteniendo la relación de causa y efecto entre el pasado y el presente.
content.stimulus_en:
If he had taken the job, he would be living in France now.

Had he taken... ...
content.correct_answer: the job, he would be living in France now.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'KNOW':
content.explanation: La transformación implica usar la forma correcta del pasado para mostrar lo que podría haber sido.
content.stimulus_en:
If they had known about the meeting, they would join us.

Had they known... ...
content.correct_answer: about the meeting, they would join us.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences with the correct words related to formal writing.
content.main_text: In formal writing, it is essential to maintain a level of professionalism. Every document should have a clear (1)___, which provides an overview of the main points. Additionally, the introduction is crucial; it should (2)___ the purpose of the letter or report. The body paragraphs must be (3)___ organized to present arguments effectively. Employing a range of (4)___ vocabulary can enhance the clarity of the message. Finally, the conclusion should (5)___ the key findings and suggest next steps.
content.explanation:
(1) La estructura es esencial para organizar el contenido y facilitar la comprensión del texto.
(2) Es importante que la introducción indique claramente el propósito del documento.
(3) Usar 'well' implica que la organización sea de alta calidad, lo cual es fundamental en la escritura formal.
(4) 'Formal' vocabulario es clave para mantener el tono apropiado en la escritura profesional.
(5) La conclusión debe reunir los puntos clave y facilitar una visión clara de las acciones a seguir.
